results.name: Tales of Grumville: A Legendary Pie and A Nameless Statue

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended. Mouse.

Minimum:

  • Storage: 600 MB available space

results.name: Date A Live: Spirit Pledge - Global

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10300H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1650 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game also runs on some older GPUs like GeForce 1050 4 GB vram with an average 30fps on low settings
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600KF
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 SUPER
